html {height: 100%}

h1.p: Oops! That page can’t be found.

div.p: It looks like nothing was found at this location.

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.script: var pageNaviConf = { perPage: 6, numPages: 5, firstText: "First", lastText: "Last", nextText: "Next", prevText: "Prev" }

b:widget.title: Navbar

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.9.0/jquery.min.js" ></script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.9.0/jquery-ui.min.js" ></script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.7.2/themes/ui-darkness/jquery-ui.css" type="text/css" />

<style type="text/css">
	.aau_tbl{
		vertical-align: top;
		width: 100%;
	}
	.aau_tbl div{
		background-color: #060C1C;
		border-radius: 5px;
		border: 1px solid #000;
		margin: 3px 3px 0px 0px;
		padding: 3px;
	}
    .aau_tbl td[valign] div[style] {
        display: grid;
    }
	.aau_icn div{
		padding: 4px;
	}

.ui-widget-content {
background: none !important;
}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
	$(document).ready(function() {
		//$('a').css('color', 'yellow');
		$( ".uitabs" ).tabs();
	});
</script>
